name: Technology Training (Mission Techies)
description: Mission Techies IT Support Professional – Beginning Program Learn on-demand skills that will have you job-ready in 15 weeks! What jobs would you apply for with this certificate? -Database Administrator -Help Desk Technician -IT Technician
fullDescription: Mission Techies IT Support Professional – Beginning Program Learn on-demand skills that will have you job-ready in 15 weeks! What jobs would you apply for with this certificate? -Database Administrator -Help Desk Technician -IT Technician
whatTheyOffer: Mission Techies IT Support Professional – Beginning Program Learn on-demand skills that will have you job-ready in 15 weeks! What jobs would you apply for with this certificate? -Database Administrator -Help Desk Technician -IT Technician
howToGetIt: Requirements: -Must live in San Francisco -Photo ID -GED or High School certificate -Pass the English/Math assessment and interview -Attend the mandatory in person three hours orientation with the required documents Contact Marcela Trujano at mtrujano@medasf.org for more information and registration.
